meanings.definition: Beyond what is usual or necessary
meanings.sent1: She brought an extra sandwich for her friend.
meanings.sent2: He had extra time to finish his homework.
meanings.sent3: The extra cookie in the jar made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His extra effort in practice paid off during the game.
meanings.sent5: The extra toppings on the pizza made it delicious.

meanings.sent1: She bought an extra book for her collection.
meanings.sent2: He needed extra help with his math homework.
meanings.sent3: The extra chair at the table was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her extra notes in the margin helped her understand the text better.
meanings.sent5: The extra batteries in the drawer came in handy during the power outage.

meanings.sent1: She received an extra gift on her birthday.
meanings.sent2: He wore an extra fancy suit to the event.
meanings.sent3: The extra decorations at the party made it memorable.
meanings.sent4: Her extra talent in singing amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The extra care she took in wrapping the present was evident.
